cont.entity_a: Insufficient product information for lay users.
Not suitable for use as a main computer for a lay person.
Software had a strange name and was unusable.
cont.entity_b: Fast and easy software with many options for WEP keys.

cont.entity_a: Windows 10 updates filled the storage memory.
cont.entity_b: Trouble installing due to incomplete Windows upgrade, not adapter's fault.
Great performance, but requires Linksys software for setup.

cont.entity_a: Reliable for connecting older computers to the Internet.
cont.entity_b: Consistent internet connection and better than built-in network card.

cont.entity_a: WPA & WEP are fully supported, with easy connections over long distances. Better signal than a more expensive USB N adaptor. Works fine within 30-40 feet but signal drops drastically beyond that. Signal is strong on the patio and even upstairs. Good signal reception throughout a two-story house.
cont.entity_b: Excellent range and performance with Linksys WRT54GX4 router. Reliable with no setup issues, works in all rooms of a three-story home. Great reception and performance, even at long distances.

cont.entity_a: Installation took a week to figure out but works well once set up. Simple installation with good performance.
Low price with prompt delivery and good condition.
cont.entity_b: Great price but difficult to pick up a wireless connection in some locations.

cont.entity_a: Does not work with recent secure routers.
cont.entity_b: Compatible with Linksys wireless router, no connection problems. Works well with Linksys routers, but causes boot issues when inserted.
Reliable with great performance for business and home use.

cont.entity_a: Speedbooster feature showed no performance change.
cont.entity_b: Better range and signal strength than internal wireless.

cont.entity_a: The card froze and had an address conflict on the network. Faulty product was refunded by the helpful seller.
cont.entity_b: Occasional dialog box error when not attached to work computer. Locks up the computer when plugged in.

cont.entity_a: Older laptops benefit from this adapter as it leaves USB ports free.
cont.entity_b: Adapter works great with older laptops without built-in wireless.
